item.description:
At this meeting of our Book Club we will be discussing the book HOLOGRAM OF LIBERTY: The Constitution's Shocking Alliance with Big Government by Kenneth W. Royce.  In this book, Mr. Royce outlines his argument that the States and the American People were politically "checkmated" over 210 years ago.  The book also offers three peaceful solutions to resolve inherent conflicts within The Constitution.

Please join us!  All are welcome as we discuss this "must read" book for anyone truly concerned, or curious, about how The United States of America landed in the uncomfortable position that it is in today.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: Discussion of HOLOGRAM OF LIBERTY
